posts.written:
APK Pure is hands down the best Play Store alternative. With APK Pure you have way more apps compared to the Play Store, and also a similar layout. Not only that but you have more categories which includes the editors top picks, and the most popular android apps and games.


In general, the utility is fun, but just download it from Google Play in our region can not. You need to use third-party resources, download the APK-file and install it on your smartphone. What to do? I'm in such cases, the recipe is simple: come to the APK Downloader . This wonderful site more than once saved me, but for some reason, not this time. He unsubscribed some vague excuse, and I had to find analogues. As a result, I came across APKPure.

posts.title: Getting APKPure App
posts.written:
Getting APKPure App

Step 1 : Go to Settings


Step 2 : Go to Security


Step 3 : Go to Unknown Sources


Step 4 : Make sure unknown sources is checked


Step 5 : Download APK Pure from play store.


Step 6 : Wait for APK Pure to finish downloading


Step 7 : Open APK Pure


Step 8 : You will now have the best play store alternative on your android

posts.title: APKPure App
posts.written: As you can see in the screenshot, the web service is not much different from their peers. Beat in the search box the name of the application or a link on Google Play, and APK-file is downloaded to your hard drive. The home page is located at the most popular games of other users and utilities. This APKPure is similar to another rival - APK-DL, which you have already read in the pages of Layfhakera. By the way, the review character copes with the Cyrillic alphabet, so finding a Russian-language application will not be difficult. With the basic functions of a site we figured out, it's time to announce the seemingly minor but very useful features.

posts.title: APKPure Features
posts.written:
1. Region-locked Free

• APKPure offers a selection of the best Android games and Apps in 2016, no region lock worries. Download and play now for free.


2. Safe Downloading

• All Apps in the APKPure App are safe for your Android. They have to pass a signature verification check before they list in APKPure.


3. APKPure in your Language

• APKPure mobile App is available in the following languages: English(US), Chinese. Coming soon: Arabic, Japanese, Dutch, German, French, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, etc.


4. Pause and Resume

• You can easily Pause and resume the apk download progress, that Restart button swiches to be Pause when the download is in working.
